cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the development of a Bangla OCR, which involves the use of algorithms and methods for image processing, character recognition, and language modeling. These topics are commonly studied in the fields of information retrieval (cs.IR), computer vision (cs.CV), computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
